author: By BRENDAN FARRINGTON and TERRY SPENCER Associated Press
title: Florida governor issues statewide stay-at-home order
description: TALLAHASSEE, Fla. (AP) — Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis issued a statewide stay-at-home order Wednesday as federal and local pressure mounted for him to abandon the county-by-county approach he had implemented.
content:
TALLAHASSEE, Fla. (AP) Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis issued a statewide stay-at-home order Wednesday as federal and local pressure mounted for him to abandon the county-by-county approach he had implemented in response to the coronavirus pandemic.
